metadata.synopsis: After getting the explosive potion:- If players destroy the potion, Araj will try to kill players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: After receive the potion, destroy the potion inside S_Debug_Teleport_LOW_BloodMerchantsHouse_d03dde24-13d3-4fdd-a485-38b9a424f6c3

0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
0.text: You couldn't have - not Formula Gruna. How... how could you?!
